resources.string:
Nice to meet you! 

I'm your new personal weather pal (Assistant just sounds dreary). In no time, I'll be whipping up forecasts like there's no tomorrow! 

There's just one thingâ€¦

I assure you, you're in good hands! We'll meet again real soon.

 Sincerely,
Brellbert
But there will be! I wasn\'t expecting company so soon...\n\nNo matter! I\'ll have this place up in running soon enough. Then I can whip up forecasts like there\'s no tomorrow.
